card.name: IndianOil HDFC Bank Credit Card
card.description: Earn up to 50 Litres of Free fuel annually with the IndianOil HDFC Bank Credit Card. Earn Fuel Points on spends at IndianOil outlets, groceries, and bill payments with additional benefits like fuel surcharge waiver and contactless payments.
card.target_audience: Individuals who want to earn fuel benefits and cashback on everyday spends.

categories.name: IndianOil outlets
categories.description: Earn 5% of your spends as Fuel Points at IndianOil outlets (Max 250 Fuel Points per month in first 6 months, Max 150 Fuel Points post 6 months from card issuance).
categories.exclusions: No reward points on rental and government category payments.

categories.name: Groceries and Bill Payments
categories.description: Earn 5% Fuel Points on groceries and bill payments (Max 100 Fuel Points per month on each category).
categories.terms_and_conditions: Applicable on POS and Ecomm transactions.
categories.how_to_earn: Use card for groceries and bill payments.
categories.exclusions: No reward points on rental and government category payments.

categories.name: Other purchases
categories.description: Earn 1 Fuel Point for every ₹150 spent on all other purchases including UPI transactions.
categories.exclusions: No reward points on rental and government category payments.

bonus_rates.condition: First year spend of ₹50,000 and above

redemption.process: Redeem Fuel Points for free fuel at participating IndianOil Petrol Outlets by converting Fuel Points into XRP.
Redeem Fuel Points through NetBanking towards catalogue products.
Redeem Fuel Points as cashback on your IndianOil HDFC Bank Credit Card statement balance.

benefits.name: Fuel Points
benefits.description: Earn Fuel Points on spends at IndianOil outlets, groceries, and bill payments.
benefits.value: Up to 50 Litres of free fuel annually.
benefits.terms_and_conditions: Max caps apply on Fuel Points accrual.
benefits.eligibility: Cardholders of IndianOil HDFC Bank Credit Card.
benefits.usage_limit: Max 250 Fuel Points per month in first 6 months, max 150 post 6 months.

benefits.name: Fuel Surcharge Waiver
benefits.description: 1% fuel surcharge waiver at all fuel stations across India on minimum transaction of ₹400.
benefits.value: Max cashback of ₹250 per statement cycle.
benefits.eligibility: Cardholders of IndianOil HDFC Bank Credit Card.

benefits.name: Contactless Payment
benefits.description: Enabled for contactless payments up to ₹5000 without PIN.
benefits.how_to_avail: Look for contactless symbol on card and tap at retail outlets.
benefits.terms_and_conditions: For transactions ₹5000 or more, PIN required.
benefits.eligibility: Cardholders of IndianOil HDFC Bank Credit Card.

benefits.name: Smart EMI
benefits.description: Option to convert big spends into EMI after purchase.
benefits.how_to_avail: Opt for EMI conversion post purchase.
benefits.eligibility: Cardholders of IndianOil HDFC Bank Credit Card.

current_offers.title: Renewal Fee Waiver
current_offers.description: Spend ₹50,000 and above in the first year and get a waiver on the renewal membership fee.

perks.name: IndianOil XTRAREWARDSTM Program (IXRP)
perks.description: Complimentary membership for Fuel Points redemption and benefits.
perks.how_to_use: Redeem Fuel Points via IXRP membership.

partnerships.benefit: Fuel Points and fuel surcharge waiver
partnerships.terms_and_conditions: Max caps on Fuel Points and cashback apply.

fees_and_charges.amount: Waived on spending ₹50,000 in first year
fees_and_charges.waiver_conditions: Spend ₹50,000 and above in first year
fees_and_charges.terms_and_conditions: Renewal fee waiver applicable only if spend criteria met.
